alert.note: Alert for Haskell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 6:52PM CDT until May 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Haskell County in west central Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 652 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Haskell, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lake Stamford Marina and Paint Creek around 705 PM CDT. Stamford around 710 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Jud, Us- 277 Near The Haskell-Knox County Line and Us-380 Near The Haskell- Stonewall County Line. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
